title: Trading Spaces: Boys vs. Girls
overview: Trading Spaces: Boys vs. Girls was an American 2003 reality television series spin-off of the home redecorating series, Trading Spaces, hosted by Diane Mizota. During the fourth season, Chuck Cureau hosted seven episodes until the show ended in 2005. In each episode, two friends (ranging in age from 8 to 14) redecorate each other's bedrooms in themes relating to the other's tastes or hobbies. Trading Spaces: Boys vs. Girls aired regularly on the Discovery Kids.
